a gift to all primary collectors of my Red Thread series (tz1heGYuzy4Qgebga3Hs6bUatEkk1nCKLFjC) for the second a\terHEN exhibition "II". This is the full poem I used in 1908 [OBJKT#572152]; it's made with the subtitles of the intertitles from Stenka Razin, one of the first narrative films of pre-revolution Russian cinema. :: {2020} :: charcoal on paper :: @annaxmalina :: annamalina.com
